item.title: Why Web3
item.description: House of Peregrine Genesis Collectible We have an epic vision at House of Peregrine: to make living internationally more beautiful, connected and sustainable by uniting our global community of internationals in a new way. We believe in producing fewer, high-quality products uniquely curated and designed for and by our members. And we boldly believe that our community will play a critical role in shaping House of Peregrine’s future. Some call our vision —of building a business by growing a supportive community rather than just another blog or facebook group “too ambitious.
